CIPHER.0.cipherString: I see my role in the Bonzos as being the straight man, in many ways.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Leadership cannot just go along to get along. Leadership must meet the moral challenge of the day.
CIPHER.1.question: Solve this quote which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: I'm really only happy when I'm on stage. I just feed off the energy of the audience. That's what I'm all about - people and laughter.
CIPHER.2.question: Solve this quote which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I've never been one to look up the ladder. I've always looked down the ladder. As long as there's one guy down there, I'm fine.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: The older I get, the more open-minded I get, the less judgmental I get.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Society is a republic. When an individual tries to lift themselves above others, they are dragged down by the mass, either by ridicule or slander.
CIPHER.5.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,4).

CIPHER.6.cipherString: God blesses us all with different views and perspectives and levels of influence and power.
CIPHER.6.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,22).

CIPHER.7.cipherString: Let the great world spin for ever down the ringing grooves of change.
CIPHER.7.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword borders.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: The common agenda both sides seem to share is: Whatever works.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword saved.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: I believe in large families: every woman should have at least three husbands.
CIPHER.9.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that R rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I live in a sort of insular world. It's mostly my family, my house, staying home and working.
CIPHER.10.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that R rails were used to encode it.
